DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness select healthy marriage ( HM ) responsible fatherhood ( RF ) grant program , authorize Claims Resolution Act 2010 . The program intend improve well-being parent family domains economic self-sufficiency , parenting , healthy relationship .
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation Selected Responsible Fatherhood Healthy Marriage Programs : Parents Children Together
DOC.detailed_description: Since 2006 , Congress provide funding grant provide healthy marriage responsible fatherhood service help interested couple father enhance improve adult parent-child relationship meet objective . The Administration Children Families ( ACF ) , within Department Health Human Services ( HHS ) , oversee grant provide support assist grantee meet goal objective . To learn implementation effect program , ACF award contract 2011 Mathematica Policy Research , Inc. conduct Parents Children Together ( PACT ) evaluation . The evaluation include separate impact process study responsible fatherhood healthy marriage program . Individuals eligible program agree study randomly assign either program group control group . Program group member offer program service ; control group member offer service able receive service available community . The impact study examine whether program improve outcomes father , mother , family , child program group compare outcome control group . Members program control group survey twice : randomly assign 12 month later . At 12-month follow-up , group ask complete telephone survey . The survey cover range question relate adult relationship interaction , parent-child interaction economic stability . Corresponding process study examine multiple aspect implementation operation program . Information process study obtain : interviews program partner organization manager staff ; observation program operation ; focus group program participant non-participants ; data grantee 's management information system .
DOC.criteria: To eligible PACT HM Evaluation , applicant must part couple ( defined couple ) couple member apply program : 1 . Both member couple eligible program 2 . Both member couple 18 year age old 3 . One member couple female male 4 . At least one member couple expectant parent parent biological adoptive child living ( That child need child common need live one parent ) To eligible PACT RF evaluation , individual must : 1 . Be male 2 . Be 18 year old 3 . Have live biological adopt child expect child Does meet inclusion criterion
